there are no bodies of Aile and his group, they feel relieved."},{"lineNumber":259499,"originalJapaneseLine":"順調に勝ち進んでいる事が分かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"It is clear that they are advancing smoothly much..."},{"lineNumber":259505,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに上から何かがふってきた。どーーーん","translatedEnglishLine":"Then something falls from above. Boom!"},{"lineNumber":259506,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ＣＧ：落ちてきたサテラ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(CG: Satella falling down)"},{"lineNumber":259507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　1.5メートル四方の木箱を荷台につんで１０名ほどの兵士で担いでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"About ten soldiers are carrying a 1.5 meter square wooden box loaded on a wagon."},{"lineNumber":259508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　そこに真上からサテラが落ちてきて木箱を破壊した","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella falls directly from above, smashing the wooden box."},{"lineNumber":259509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　いてて、と　尻餅をついて周囲を見渡すサテラ（当然無傷）","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Ouch,’ Satella falls on her bottom and looks around (naturally unharmed)."},{"lineNumber":259510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　木箱を運んでいた兵士は吹き飛び気絶していたりする。","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers carrying the box are blown away and knocked unconscious."},{"lineNumber":259511,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　木箱は壊れ、中から氷柱シィルが見える　（ここでユーザーに始めて見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"The box is broken, revealing Hyouchuu Shiel inside (shown to the player for the first time here)."},{"lineNumber":259512,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　この段階ではサテラはシィルには気が付いていない","translatedEnglishLine":"At this stage, Satella has not noticed Shiel."},{"lineNumber":259513,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259514,"originalJapaneseLine":"母達があわてている、何事だ・・何か振ってきた・・サテラ？","translatedEnglishLine":"The mothers are panicking. What is happening...? Something fell... Satella?"},{"lineNumber":259515,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルさんは無事か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Is Shiel-san okay...?"},{"lineNumber":259516,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ　シィル？ん、これはなんだ、こいつは・・まさか","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella: Shiel? Hmm, what is this? This one... no way."},{"lineNumber":259517,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかったぞ、お前らコレで魔王様の気持ちをまた動揺させる気だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you guys intend to unsettle the Demon King again with this."},{"lineNumber":259518,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは氷柱シィルを持ち去ろうとする","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella attempts to carry away Hyouchuu Shiel."},{"lineNumber":259519,"originalJapaneseLine":"まてと、母親達は精鋭の衛兵と共にサテラに立ち向かうが","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Wait,’ the mothers confront Satella together with elite guards,"},{"lineNumber":259520,"originalJapaneseLine":"無敵結界の魔人に傷つける事は出来ず、軽く敗退する","translatedEnglishLine":"but they cannot harm the demon with the invincible barrier and are lightly defeated."},{"lineNumber":259521,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは氷柱シィルを軽々と抱えると飛び去った","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella easily lifts Hyouchuu Shiel and flies away."},{"lineNumber":259522,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サイゼル、使徒ゆきとの戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle against the demon Saizel and apostle Yuki."},{"lineNumber":259523,"originalJapaneseLine":"現れたシーン、そして戦いになります","translatedEnglishLine":"The scene where they appear, followed by the battle."},{"lineNumber":259524,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":259525,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":259526,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかサイゼルとゆきを撃退した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, they managed to repel Saizel and Yuki."},{"lineNumber":259527,"originalJapaneseLine":"連続の戦いのせいか、緊張が途切れがちになっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Possibly due to the consecutive battles, their tension begins to slacken."},{"lineNumber":259528,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな疲れてささいなミスが発生した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is tired and small mistakes started happening."},{"lineNumber":259529,"originalJapaneseLine":"あやうく負けるという瞬間もあった。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was even a moment when they nearly lost."},{"lineNumber":259530,"originalJapaneseLine":"休憩をするが少し口喧嘩・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They take a break but then start a bit of a quarrel..."},{"lineNumber":259531,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりよくない雰囲気","translatedEnglishLine":"The atmosphere is not very good."},{"lineNumber":259532,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time,"},{"lineNumber":259533,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラに箱を奪われた母親達","translatedEnglishLine":"The mothers whose box was stolen by Satella"},{"lineNumber":259534,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらも揉めている","translatedEnglishLine":"are also in a dispute."},{"lineNumber":259535,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうするのよ、シィルがいないとランスを元に戻せないじゃない","translatedEnglishLine":"What do we do? Without Shiel, we can't restore Rance."},{"lineNumber":259536,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・サテラを追いかけましょう、取り戻すします","translatedEnglishLine":"...Let's chase after Satella and take it back."},{"lineNumber":259537,"originalJapaneseLine":"と冷静に答えるクルックー","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukku replies calmly."},{"lineNumber":259538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　※設定．この段階では　何故シィルが居るのかの説明はしない","translatedEnglishLine":"*Note: At this stage, no explanation is given as to why Shiel is here."},{"lineNumber":259539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　※　　　母親達だけが知っている何かがあるんだと匂わすくらい","translatedEnglishLine":"*It only hints that there is something only the mothers know."},{"lineNumber":259540,"originalJapaneseLine":"疲れ始めフラフラと進むエール達","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile and the others begin to tire and stagger forward."},{"lineNumber":259541,"originalJapaneseLine":"その目の前に魔人レイが立ち塞がる","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Rey appears blocking their path right before them."},{"lineNumber":259542,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪いがここは通せない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, but I can't let you pass here..."},{"lineNumber":259543,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":259544,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・","translatedEnglishLine":".."},{ "lineNumber": 259545, "originalJapaneseLine": "戦いが始まって30分、勝負が付かない疲れだけが溜まっていく", "translatedEnglishLine": "The battle has lasted 30 minutes without a clear winner; only fatigue accumulates." },{ "lineNumber": 259546, "originalJapaneseLine": "距離を取り、こちらを殺さない程度にレイは戦う、時間だけかかる", "translatedEnglishLine": "Rey keeps distance and fights without killing them, prolonging the time." },{ "lineNumber": 259547, "originalJapaneseLine": "どういうつもりだと聞くと、魔王様の子供達を殺す訳にはいかんしな、諦めて帰って", "translatedEnglishLine": "When asked his intention, he says he can't kill the Demon King's children and hopes they will give up and return." },{ "lineNumber": 259548, "originalJapaneseLine": "くれるのを期待しているのだけどねと余裕のある言い方をする", "translatedEnglishLine": "He speaks confidently, expecting them to give up." },{ "lineNumber": 259549, "originalJapaneseLine": "エール達、子供達もイライラ、仲間同士で口喧嘩しはじめる、心が折れかかる。", "translatedEnglishLine": "Aile and the children grow irritated and start quarrelling among themselves, their spirits nearly breaking." },{ "lineNumber": 259550, "originalJapaneseLine": "　", "translatedEnglishLine":""},{ "lineNumber": 259551, "originalJapaneseLine": "それを見たアームズが子供達を先にいかせ、魔剣カオスを持って魔人レイに立ち塞がる", "translatedEnglishLine": "Arms sees this, lets the children go ahead, and stands in front of demon Rey wielding the demon sword Chaos."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃母親達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the mothers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、シーラ、マジック、リア、香姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku, Sheila, Magic, Ria, Koki,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他何名かのお供　各国からの護衛兵　全部合わせても５０名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and several other attendants and guards from various countries, totaling about 50 people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達の後をゆっくりと進んでいる、200メートルほど下の位置
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They steadily proceed behind Aile and the others, about 200 meters below.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達に木箱もゆっくりと運ばせている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers are also slowly carrying wooden boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中、何度か戦闘の後や死体を見つける、エール達の死体は無いので安心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Along the way, they find signs of battles and corpses several times, but since there are no bodies of Aile and his group, they feel relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順調に勝ち進んでいる事が分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is clear that they are advancing smoothly and winning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察の部下からの情報、子供達　魔人サテラと交戦に入ったと聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From reconnaissance subordinates, they hear that the children have engaged in battle with the demon Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ　かなみ　にしてもいいかもしれないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This might be fine if done with Kanami,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者としては歳を取り過ぎていてすぐ疲れるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as a ninja, she's too old and gets tired quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その為に立ち絵用意するのもなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and preparing character art just for that might be too much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに上から何かがふってきた。どーーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then something falls from above. Boom!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：落ちてきたサテラ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Satella falling down)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 1.5メートル四方の木箱を荷台につんで１０名ほどの兵士で担いでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten soldiers are carrying a 1.5 meter square wooden box loaded on a wagon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに真上からサテラが落ちてきて木箱を破壊した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella falls directly from above, smashing the wooden box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いてて、と　尻餅をついて周囲を見渡すサテラ（当然無傷）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Ouch,’ Satella falls on her bottom and looks around (naturally unharmed).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木箱を運んでいた兵士は吹き飛び気絶していたりする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers carrying the box are blown away and knocked unconscious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木箱は壊れ、中から氷柱シィルが見える　（ここでユーザーに始めて見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The box is broken, revealing Hyouchuu Shiel inside (shown to the player for the first time here).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この段階ではサテラはシィルには気が付いていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this stage, Satella has not noticed Shiel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母達があわてている、何事だ・・何か振ってきた・・サテラ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers are panicking. What is happening...? Something fell... Satella?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんは無事か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Shiel-san okay...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ　シィル？ん、これはなんだ、こいつは・・まさか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella: Shiel? Hmm, what is this? This one... no way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかったぞ、お前らコレで魔王様の気持ちをまた動揺させる気だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you guys intend to unsettle the Demon King again with this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは氷柱シィルを持ち去ろうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella attempts to carry away Hyouchuu Shiel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まてと、母親達は精鋭の衛兵と共にサテラに立ち向かうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Wait,’ the mothers confront Satella together with elite guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界の魔人に傷つける事は出来ず、軽く敗退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they cannot harm the demon with the invincible barrier and are lightly defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは氷柱シィルを軽々と抱えると飛び去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella easily lifts Hyouchuu Shiel and flies away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、使徒ゆきとの戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle against the demon Saizel and apostle Yuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れたシーン、そして戦いになります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene where they appear, followed by the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかサイゼルとゆきを撃退した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, they managed to repel Saizel and Yuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連続の戦いのせいか、緊張が途切れがちになっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Possibly due to the consecutive battles, their tension begins to slacken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな疲れてささいなミスが発生した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is tired and small mistakes started happening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あやうく負けるという瞬間もあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was even a moment when they nearly lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩をするが少し口喧嘩・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take a break but then start a bit of a quarrel...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりよくない雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere is not very good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラに箱を奪われた母親達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers whose box was stolen by Satella

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらも揉めている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are also in a dispute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするのよ、シィルがいないとランスを元に戻せないじゃない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do we do? Without Shiel, we can't restore Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・サテラを追いかけましょう、取り戻すします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Let's chase after Satella and take it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と冷静に答えるクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku replies calmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※設定．この段階では　何故シィルが居るのかの説明はしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: At this stage, no explanation is given as to why Shiel is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　　母親達だけが知っている何かがあるんだと匂わすくらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *It only hints that there is something only the mothers know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れ始めフラフラと進むエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the others begin to tire and stagger forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その目の前に魔人レイが立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rey appears blocking their path right before them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いがここは通せない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, but I can't let you pass here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いが始まって30分、勝負が付かない疲れだけが溜まっていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle has lasted 30 minutes without a clear winner; only fatigue accumulates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 距離を取り、こちらを殺さない程度にレイは戦う、時間だけかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rey keeps distance and fights without killing them, prolonging the time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういうつもりだと聞くと、魔王様の子供達を殺す訳にはいかんしな、諦めて帰って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked his intention, he says he can't kill the Demon King's children and hopes they will give up and return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くれるのを期待しているのだけどねと余裕のある言い方をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He speaks confidently, expecting them to give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達、子供達もイライラ、仲間同士で口喧嘩しはじめる、心が折れかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the children grow irritated and start quarrelling among themselves, their spirits nearly breaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見たアームズが子供達を先にいかせ、魔剣カオスを持って魔人レイに立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms sees this, lets the children go ahead, and stands in front of demon Rey wielding the demon sword Chaos.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃母親達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the mothers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、シーラ、マジック、リア、香姫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku, Sheila, Magic, Ria, Koki,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他何名かのお供　各国からの護衛兵　全部合わせても５０名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and several other attendants and guards from various countries, totaling about 50 people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達の後をゆっくりと進んでいる、200メートルほど下の位置
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They steadily proceed behind Aile and the others, about 200 meters below.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達に木箱もゆっくりと運ばせている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers are also slowly carrying wooden boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中、何度か戦闘の後や死体を見つける、エール達の死体は無いので安心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Along the way, they find signs of battles and corpses several times, but since there are no bodies of Aile and his group, they feel relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順調に勝ち進んでいる事が分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is clear that they are advancing smoothly and winning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察の部下からの情報、子供達　魔人サテラと交戦に入ったと聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From reconnaissance subordinates, they hear that the children have engaged in battle with the demon Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ　かなみ　にしてもいいかもしれないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This might be fine if done with Kanami,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者としては歳を取り過ぎていてすぐ疲れるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as a ninja, she's too old and gets tired quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その為に立ち絵用意するのもなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and preparing character art just for that might be too much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに上から何かがふってきた。どーーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then something falls from above. Boom!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：落ちてきたサテラ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Satella falling down)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 1.5メートル四方の木箱を荷台につんで１０名ほどの兵士で担いでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten soldiers are carrying a 1.5 meter square wooden box loaded on a wagon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに真上からサテラが落ちてきて木箱を破壊した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella falls directly from above, smashing the wooden box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いてて、と　尻餅をついて周囲を見渡すサテラ（当然無傷）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Ouch,’ Satella falls on her bottom and looks around (naturally unharmed).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木箱を運んでいた兵士は吹き飛び気絶していたりする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers carrying the box are blown away and knocked unconscious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木箱は壊れ、中から氷柱シィルが見える　（ここでユーザーに始めて見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The box is broken, revealing Hyouchuu Shiel inside (shown to the player for the first time here).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この段階ではサテラはシィルには気が付いていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this stage, Satella has not noticed Shiel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母達があわてている、何事だ・・何か振ってきた・・サテラ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers are panicking. What is happening...? Something fell... Satella?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんは無事か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Shiel-san okay...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ　シィル？ん、これはなんだ、こいつは・・まさか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella: Shiel? Hmm, what is this? This one... no way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかったぞ、お前らコレで魔王様の気持ちをまた動揺させる気だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you guys intend to unsettle the Demon King again with this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは氷柱シィルを持ち去ろうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella attempts to carry away Hyouchuu Shiel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まてと、母親達は精鋭の衛兵と共にサテラに立ち向かうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Wait,’ the mothers confront Satella together with elite guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界の魔人に傷つける事は出来ず、軽く敗退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they cannot harm the demon with the invincible barrier and are lightly defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは氷柱シィルを軽々と抱えると飛び去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella easily lifts Hyouchuu Shiel and flies away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼル、使徒ゆきとの戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle against the demon Saizel and apostle Yuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れたシーン、そして戦いになります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene where they appear, followed by the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかサイゼルとゆきを撃退した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, they managed to repel Saizel and Yuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連続の戦いのせいか、緊張が途切れがちになっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Possibly due to the consecutive battles, their tension begins to slacken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな疲れてささいなミスが発生した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is tired and small mistakes started happening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あやうく負けるという瞬間もあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was even a moment when they nearly lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩をするが少し口喧嘩・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take a break but then start a bit of a quarrel...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりよくない雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere is not very good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラに箱を奪われた母親達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers whose box was stolen by Satella

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらも揉めている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are also in a dispute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするのよ、シィルがいないとランスを元に戻せないじゃない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do we do? Without Shiel, we can't restore Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・サテラを追いかけましょう、取り戻すします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Let's chase after Satella and take it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と冷静に答えるクルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku replies calmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※設定．この段階では　何故シィルが居るのかの説明はしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: At this stage, no explanation is given as to why Shiel is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　　母親達だけが知っている何かがあるんだと匂わすくらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *It only hints that there is something only the mothers know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れ始めフラフラと進むエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the others begin to tire and stagger forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その目の前に魔人レイが立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rey appears blocking their path right before them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いがここは通せない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, but I can't let you pass here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いが始まって30分、勝負が付かない疲れだけが溜まっていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle has lasted 30 minutes without a clear winner; only fatigue accumulates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 距離を取り、こちらを殺さない程度にレイは戦う、時間だけかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rey keeps distance and fights without killing them, prolonging the time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういうつもりだと聞くと、魔王様の子供達を殺す訳にはいかんしな、諦めて帰って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked his intention, he says he can't kill the Demon King's children and hopes they will give up and return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くれるのを期待しているのだけどねと余裕のある言い方をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He speaks confidently, expecting them to give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達、子供達もイライラ、仲間同士で口喧嘩しはじめる、心が折れかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile and the children grow irritated and start quarrelling among themselves, their spirits nearly breaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見たアームズが子供達を先にいかせ、魔剣カオスを持って魔人レイに立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms sees this, lets the children go ahead, and stands in front of demon Rey wielding the demon sword Chaos.
